Blacklist

sudo gedit /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist.conf

.run

  1. Open a terminal. In Gnome the terminal is found in Applications>Accessories>Terminal.
  2. Navigate to the directory of the .run file. For this example, I have mine on the desktop so I would type in «cd ~/Desktop» and press enter.
  3. Type «chmod +x example.run» (press enter).
  4. Now type »./example.run», press enter, and the installer will run.

.tar.gz

  1. Сначала распаковка tar -xvf /path/to/archive.tar.bz2
  2. Установка (обычно в папке install.readme)

.sh

  1. Зайти в свойства файла
  2. Permissions→Tick Allow Executing File As Program
  3. 2 щелчка по файлу
  4. Ура

Useful packages

  • gcc - sudo apt-get install build-essential or gcc
  • gpp - sudo apt-get install g++
  • glib - sudo apt-get install libglib2.0-dev
  • glib json - libjson-glib-1.0-0
  • glib json docs - libjson-glib-doc
  • glxinfo | grep OpenGL - mesa-utils
